thread.title: MEIZU m5s with 5.2-inch display, 3GB RAM and fast charging launched in China
thread.title_full: MEIZU m5s with 5.2-inch display, 3GB RAM and fast charging launched in China

title: MEIZU m5s with 5.2-inch display, 3GB RAM and fast charging launched in China
text:
MEIZU m5s with 5.2-inch display, 3GB RAM and fast charging launched in... MEIZU m5s with 5.2-inch display, 3GB RAM and fast charging launched in China By - February 15, 2017 “The MEIZU m5s’ 3,000mAh battery is capable of charging up to 56 percent in 30 minutes” 
MEIZU has unveiled its latest smartphone called the m5s in its home market of China. The phone comes as a successor to the MEIZU m5. A 3,000mAh battery is one of the biggest highlights of the m5s, which supports fast charging. Thanks to this tech, the phone’s battery is capable of charging up to 56 percent in just 30 minutes. 
The MEIZU m5s sports a premium metal unibody design and a fingerprint sensor that’s integrated into its home button. The phone features a 5.2-inch HD display with a 2.5D curved glass on top. It is powered by a 1.3GHz octa-core MediaTek MT6753 processor, mated to 3GB of RAM. The device comes in 16GB and 32GB storage variants, which can also accept microSD cards up to 128GB in size. 
The MEIZU m5s sports a 13-megapixel primary shooter with a dual-tone LED flash, phase detection autofocus, f/2.2 aperture, a 5P lens and a Sony sensor. For selfies and video calling, it offers a 5-megapixel front-facing shooter with f/2.0 aperture. In terms of connectivity, it offers 4G, VoLTE, dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0 LE and GPS with GLONASS. 
The MEIZU m5s has been priced at RMB 799 (~Rs 7,790) for the 16GB model, while the 32GB variant will set you back by RMB 999 (~Rs 9,730). The phone comes in Rose Gold, Moonlight Silver, Champagne Gold and Star Grey hues, and will go on sale in China on February 20th. Facebook Comments
